history.proof: intros. induction l as [|y ys IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. hauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros A l f g H x Hin.

exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 0 patterns.

original: intros A l f g H x Hin. induction l as [|y ys IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. destruct (H y) as [Hy | Hy]. + rewrite Hy. simpl. destruct (g y) eqn:E. * f_equal. apply IH. intros x0 H0. apply H. right. auto. * apply IH. intros x0 H0. apply H. right. auto. + apply IH. intros x0 H0. apply H. right. auto.
